title: Image

sections.summary:

sections.title: ImageInterpolation
sections.summary:

sections.title: ImageRenderMode
sections.summary:

sections.title: ResizableOptions<sup>11+</sup>
sections.summary:

**原子化服务API：** 从API version 12开始，该接口支持在原子化服务中使用。

**系统能力：** SystemCapability.ArkUI

sections.title: RequestDownloadInfo<sup>23+</sup>
sections.summary:
type RequestDownloadInfo = DownloadInfo
